div:
Command xunzip
Name
xunzip Extracts or lists contents from a zip file
Synopsis
xunzip[ serialization options ] [-d dest] [-f zipfile] [file ...]
Description
Extracts files from a zip archive.
Options
-d,-dest destination Extracts contents to destination directory otherwise extracts to current directory
-f,-file zipfile Use zipfile as source otherwise stdin
-l,-list Lists (does not extract) content filenames to stdout
Supports the standard [ serialization options ]
If no zipfile is specified, then stdin is read.
If no destination is specified then extracts to current directory.
If -l is specified then lists (do not extract) content filenames to stdout.
If any other arguments are present then only those files are extracted. Wildcards are not supported. Filenames are case sensitive.
See xzip
